entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny. A mix of sun and cloud late this afternoon with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this afternoon. High 13. Wind chill minus 5 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening and risk of a thunderstorm. Clearing this evening. Wind south 20 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High 15.
